docs.snippet: Baltimore has an overpowering lineup, plays stingy defense and has been bolstered by the late addition of two free agents, making the Orioles a serious contender in the A.L. East....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baltimore has an overpowering lineup, plays stingy defense and has been bolstered by the late addition of two free agents, making the Orioles a serious contender in the A.L. East.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column asserts that Baltimore Orioles, under leadership of club's top executive Dan Duquette, may develop into a powerhouse; observes that team, with its overpowering lineup, stingy defense and two free agents, is likely to be serious contender in American League East.

headline.main: The Orioles Are Wired for Winning

docs.abstract: New York Yankees defeat Atlanta Braves, 7-0, in spring training game as Yankees pitcher Ivan Nova allows only two hits.
